title: Frank (Hongxiang) Fan
text:
I am currently working as a Research assistant in Nanjing Institute of Geography and Limonology, Chinese Academy of Sciences (NIGLAS) in the field of physical geography , i.e., water quality modelling, hydrodynamics, tracer-hydrology, etc. in Nanjing, China.
Additionally, I am also a Honorary visiting scholar, working with Prof. Adrian Werner on surface-groundwater interaction related projects in Flinders University.
I have developed a few  packages (e.g., SGDr, efdcr), and although most of them are personal use solely, hopefully some will be helpful.
Have a look at my complete  curriculum vitae.

title: Frank (Hongxiang) Fan
text:
Education

Ph.D. in Physical Ggeography, 2016
University Chinese Academy of Sciences, Beijing, China
M.Sc. in Physical Geography, 2013
University Chinese Academy of Sciences, Beijing, China
B.Sc. in Enviromental Engineering, 2009
Huazhong Agriclutural University, Wuhan, China
